description: The human readable encoding of the output address.
name: address

description: Whether the address is locked by a script.
name: address_has_script

description: The payment credential part of the Shelley address.
name: payment_cred

description: The hash of the transaction output datum.
name: data_hash

description: The inline datum (hash) of the output, if it has one.
name: inline_datum

description: The reference script (hash) of the output, if it has one.
name: reference_script

description: The list of outputs as triples (slot_no, txidx, index), thus the identification of the transaction by the pair of (slot_no, txidx) and then the output at index in the transaction.
name: outputs
